Title: The worst bank I have ever worked with
Reply: Hi, Thank you for your feedback, although it is negative. We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, your package does not give you access to our telephone line. This is why our internal messaging service is available to answer all your questions.If you wish to have access to our customer service on the phone, we invite you to subscribe to the EASY package. Here is a comparison of our rates: https://www.anyti.me/fr/tarifs/. We remain at your disposal,Barbara - Anytime
Experience Date: The worst bank I have ever worked withThe worst bank I have ever worked with.  They are unreachable. They allow you to sign up for appointments and then they don’t honor them (3 in a row for us), don’t answer emails, don’t respond by telephone, don’t permit you to make transfers, and are blocking our nearly 8000 euros. This is not a business bank. It’s clearly a scam.Date of experience: August 25, 2023

Title: Everything was great until you sign up
Reply: Hi Michael, We appreciate your initial positive review and we're truly sorry to hear about your recent experiences with our services. We understand the importance of the work your association is doing to support those affected by rare diseases in Ukraine during these challenging times, and we apologize for any inconvenience you've encountered.Our goal is to provide a reliable and efficient banking experience, and it's disheartening to hear that we've fallen short of your expectations. We understand that you've encountered difficulties with international transfers outside the SEPA region. We acknowledge that this limitation can be frustrating, and we're actively exploring ways to expand our international transfer options to better serve our diverse customer base.We apologize for the inconvenience you've faced with the disabled cheque features. While cheques have become less common in today's digital banking landscape, we recognize that they still hold value in certain situations. We will review the possibility of reinstating this feature or providing an alternative solution.Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention, and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.Sincerely, Barbara - Anytime
Experience Date: Everything was great until you sign upI initially gave a good review to anytime as they were great when we set up the account, which is for a new association. Our association raises money for people with rare diseases in Ukraine impacted by the war.  Now that it's time to send the money to the beneficiaries, we're told that you can only make transfers to SEPA countries with an IBAN number. Even countries outside of SEPA who have affiliated banks in the EU are no good because anytime won't let you make transfers using Swift anymore.  Since joining they have also completely disabled features to get or send cheques. (This may seem like not a big deal, until someone wants to make you a donation).  When you ask for help you get annoying AI generated responses inviting you to 'find another solution' but 'rest assured, you can still make a transfer via iban in SEPA.'  This account is very expensive for what it is. It's basically a scam. They understood where and how I wanted to send transfers when i set up the account and now there is literally nothing I can do except send the money to my personal account-so what's the point. Traditional French banks are slower and they don't like to open small association accounts so they will try to put you off, but honestly it's worth the hassle because this 'bank' really is not fit for purpose.Date of experience: September 01, 2023

Title: This is a Fraud Bank .
Reply: Hi Sayed, We are sorry for your negative experience with Anytime. We regret that our services do not meet your needs.We confirm that we have closed your account in accordance with your request.We certainly cannot erase what happened, but we take these kinds of cases very seriously. Therefore our aim is to make sure that something like this won't happen anymore.We wish you all the best for the future.Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Barbara - Anytime

Title: Don't touch with a barge pole!
Experience Date: Don't touch with a barge pole!Don't touch with a barge pole!It makes me doubt the veracity of the reviews here, had an account with them for 6 moths and it has been nothing but problems but it sort of worked with work-arounds. In September they suspended international payments, supposedly for the moth September, they are still suspended today 04/November/2021... And to brighten up my day, it seems to me all payments are now suspended, even within France as nothing goes out and transactions just evaporate from the system. And the customer service? As if it wasn't there... no answers, nothing...So, tell me this, how can a bank that has got all transfers suspended and doesn't answer help line get 4.5 stars???Date of experience: November 04, 2021
